assignments.utilization_method: Grip the pen near its writing tip between thumb and index finger with the barrel pointing forward, performing eating motions

physical_object.name: pair of black scissors with yellow handles

assignments.utilization_method: Keep the blades closed, hold one handle ring like a knife grip, and use the outside of the closed blades to perform sawing or spreading motions

physical_object.name: green and yellow kitchen scrub sponge

assignments.utilization_method: Set the sponge flat with the green abrasive side up. Stab the pen tip into the center of the sponge, sinking it through the soft yellow layer beneath before lifting out.
Pinch the thin stem near its midpoint as a handle, use the bowl of the glass as the spoon head, and practice scooping and tilting by wrist rotation

physical_object.name: wooden-handled dust brush with black bristles

assignments.utilization_method: Lay the brush with bristles up; move the glass bowl slowly through the bristle field, pushing the tips aside as you stir.

physical_object.name: clear plastic spray bottle containing blue liquid

assignments.utilization_method: Wrap hand around the neck of the bottle beneath the trigger, lift it, and rotate wrist to pour

physical_object.name: small succulent plant in yellow ribbed ceramic pot

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the ceramic pot just below the rim with one hand and gently shake it a few centimeters vertically (not sure whether it is applicable)

physical_object.name: small round metal calibration weight labeled “M 5000”

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the lower portion of the weight with one hand and twist its knurled top cap back and forth with the other hand.
